summary.body: Has anyone got a spare freeview box? I am not ready yet for a digital TV and my box just expired. I saw someone offered one in November but I suppose that one's gone by now.
summary.subject: freeview box

summary.body: Dear all I need a 2-seater sofa very quickly and it needs to be fairly teensy so I can get it through my front door (Bryer Court). Managing agents I know suggested Happy Nightmares in Whitechapel but quality was so not okay I couldn't bring myself to do it.  I need something reasonable but not expensive. All suggestions welcome... Thank you Merry Christmas Jeannie PS:  If you have a 2-seater you want to sell please call asap 07786 995399
summary.subject: Where to get a 2-seater sofa extra quick...?
